meanings.definition: A person who administers or manages something.
meanings.sent1: The administrants in the office ensure everything runs smoothly.
meanings.sent2: The school administrants handle student registrations and schedules.
meanings.sent3: The administrants had a race to see who could organize the files faster.
meanings.sent4: She was like an administrant of time, carefully planning each minute of her day.
meanings.sent5: The administrants were the unsung heroes behind the scenes, keeping things in order.

meanings.definition: Those who are responsible for carrying out administrative tasks.
meanings.sent1: Our team of administrants efficiently processed all the paperwork.
meanings.sent2: The hospital administrants coordinated patient appointments and records.
meanings.sent3: The administrants had a friendly competition to see who could answer emails the quickest.
meanings.sent4: He viewed the administrants as the gears that kept the organization moving forward.
meanings.sent5: The administrants juggled multiple tasks with ease, showcasing their organizational skills.
